Umbrella-themed Home Decor: Create a line of home decor items, such as throw pillows, blankets, and wall art, that incorporate umbrella shapes and designs. These items could be used to add a playful and whimsical touch to any room in the house.

Umbrella-themed Fashion Accessories: Design a line of fashion accessories, such as scarves, hats, and bags, that feature umbrella patterns and designs. These items could be used to add a stylish and functional touch to any outfit.
Umbrella-themed Art: Create a series of art pieces that feature umbrellas as the main subject. These pieces could be created in a variety of mediums, such as paintings, sculptures, or digital art.

Umbrella-themed Games: Design a board game or card game that incorporates umbrellas as a central theme. Players could use umbrellas to move around the board, collect points, or protect themselves from obstacles.
